intent_atoms.description: Build the Integrity tab surface with sortable/severity-filterable ParseIssue rows synchronized with ribbon metrics.
Route row selection through DocumentSessionController so focusing a row re-centers the outline and detail panes.
Hook Share/Export actions to the refreshed plaintext and JSON exporters and extend UI/export tests to verify count parity.
The Integrity tab surface must remain synchronized with ribbon metrics at all times.
ParseIssue rows in the Integrity tab are sortable and severity-filterable.
Row selection triggers DocumentSessionController to re-center outline and detail panes.
Share/Export actions use refreshed plaintext and JSON exporters, and UI/export tests confirm count parity.

functional_units.name: Integrity Summary Tab
functional_units.description: Provides a UI tab displaying ParseIssue rows that can be sorted and filtered by severity, synchronized with ribbon metrics; selecting a row focuses the outline and detail panes via DocumentSessionController.

functional_units.name: Share/Export Actions for Integrity Tab
functional_units.description: Allows users to share or export the current plaintext and JSON representations of the integrity data, ensuring exported counts match displayed counts.

functional_units.name: ResearchLogMonitor Audit Integration in SwiftUI Previews
functional_units.description: Integrates the ResearchLogMonitor audit helper into SwiftUI preview scenarios, displaying VR-006 diagnostics alongside bundled fixtures for testing.
